entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
